revised_title: Gas Dynamics of Massive Evaporation and Condensation: Effects of Viscosity and Nonlinearity
tldr: This article investigates the gas dynamic field associated with liquid-vapor phase change between two parallel liquid surfaces. The authors consider the effects of viscosity and nonlinearity on the gas dynamic field, especially for large mass fluxes, and find that these effects can be very striking. The study provides a better understanding of the phenomena of evaporation and condensation and has implications for future experimental investigations of the phenomenon.
